name: Bobby's awful idea
description:
Bobby's throwing a party, but he invited everyone in the city. How could he possibly handle all that people?

Clean the mess, calm people down, stop the fights and hope that you don't make too much noise!

How to play:
Use the arrow keys to move around the house and press the spacebar near people to calm them down.
